instruction:
Identify the type of poem written below.

Lonely at night, 
In the cold dark sky.

The stars twinkle so bright, 
A shy nod to goodbye.
output: This poem is an example of a Haiku. It is an unrhymed poem with a total of 17 syllables written in three lines with the pattern 5-7-5. It is typically written about nature and conveys a sense of tranquility and insight.
